Submodules¶

poc_project.app module¶

This file contains the core FastAPI application and a command-line interface to run it.

Modules and Imports

  • `time`: Used for measuring request processing time.

  • `click`: Provides the command-line interface functionality.

  • `uvicorn`: An ASGI server for running the FastAPI application.

  • `fastapi`: The core FastAPI framework.

  • `sqlmodel`: Facilitates interaction with the SQLite database.

  • `typing_extensions`: Provides the Dict type hint.

  • `.data.connection`: Contains the connect function to establish the database connection.

  • `.models`: Defines the RequestLogModel for database logging.

poc_project.app.app: FastAPI = <fastapi.applications.FastAPI object>¶

The main FastAPI application instance

poc_project.app.engine = Engine(sqlite:////home/rajendrayadav/Documents/deep_learning_with_pytorch/miscs/db.sqlite3)¶

The database engine object

async poc_project.app.greet_user(name='World!') → Dict[str, str][source]¶

Greeting endpoint.

  • Takes a name parameter (defaults to “World!”).

  • Returns a personalized greeting message.

async poc_project.app.index()[source]¶

Health check endpoint. Returns ‘healthy!’.

async poc_project.app.timing_middleware(request: Request, call_next)[source]¶

Middleware to log request processing time.

  • Records the start time.

  • Processes the request using call_next.

  • Calculates the processing time.

  • Logs the request path and processing time into the database.

Module contents¶

Proof of Concept (PoC) FastAPI Application

This project demonstrates a simple FastAPI application with the following features:

  • Endpoints:

    • Health Check: A basic health check endpoint (/) to verify the application’s status.

    • Personalized Greeting: An endpoint (/{name}) that generates a personalized greeting message based on the provided name.

  • Database Integration:

    • SQLite Database: Utilizes an SQLite database to store request logs.

    • Request Logging: Middleware logs request processing times into the database for monitoring and analysis.

  • Command-Line Interface:

    • Server Execution: A Click-based command-line interface allows running the FastAPI server with configurable port and debug options.

Project Structure

  • `__init__.py`: This file, providing the project overview and documentation.

  • `data/connection.py`: (Assumed) Contains the connect function for establishing the database connection.

  • `models.py`: (Assumed) Defines the RequestLogModel for database logging.

  • Other modules: The project might include additional modules for further functionality or organization.

Getting Started
